sobremi.descripcion: I focus on solving problems regarding what I do day to day. I like the improvements and good practices that I can provide to projects. I consider myself a competitive person because I like challenges. I am passionate about the technologies that come to market. I also like to work as a team and something that stands out about myself is that I never give up until I find the key that leads me to success.
servicios.descripcionuno: Planning, initial design, working from the backend database and the fronted until the launch of the website.
servicios.descripciondos: Create APIs to allow the integration of applications with external services or between different components of a system.
servicios.descripciontres: Improved website performance ensuring they are fast and efficient
servicios.descripcioncuatro: Create fully functional stores by implementing shopping cart payment processing systems.
